checkbox.name: Change FPS
checkbox.desc: Sets the FPS to 40 to be more accurate to the original game. Disable this if you want to just use the FPS you have set in your appearance settings.

checkbox.name: Flashing Lights
checkbox.desc: Disable this if you want to turn off flashing lights!

checkbox.name: Show Intro Splash
checkbox.desc: Disable this if you want to get rid of the "made in codename" intro screen.

checkbox.name: Pause on Unfocus
checkbox.desc: Enable this if you prefer want the game to pause when you look away.
